name: 2 FAST 4 1 Button
description:
Hello player and welcome to a new game.

I am the director of this game: 2 Fast 4 1 Button or 2F41B if you prefer.

You know Fornote, PIBJ, Mancraft, all games who played with so many BUTTON !

So, I want you to play in this game with ONLY one button, of course, you can choose between the space bar, the left click on your mouse or A/B/X/Y on your favorite controller.

What ? You think I'm lying ? It's a joke ?

Ok, the problem is your fear, that you won’t be able to win this game with just one SINGLE little button. 

Young players are so stopped in their time. 

SoI ask you just one time, can you take up the challenge ?

(Yes, I can)

Ok, I prefer that.

Take these shoes and this propellent.

And good luck, You’re going to need to be FAST!!!

(Alfa-50, InfiniX, Olaxe360, Maxibi, Flamergame)

 

2 Fast 4 1 Button is a race game, producted during the 1-bit GAME JAM 04/2021 by the Debilus Team, you embody Billy, the famous gamer who try to finish this game cross differents environnent: Antarctic, plains, factory, and more, ...

Can you be the best runner ? The answers will be on the finish line.

Thanks to SketchyLogic and SubspaceAudio for their music and WizMeras for his beta-testing
